Context:
The text provides instructions for using Zoom with a George Brown College (GBC) account. Here are the factual information and entities extracted from the text:

* GBC email address can be used to switch between different Zoom accounts.
* To activate a GBC Zoom account, users need to sign in on the portal <https://georgebrown-ca.zoom.us/> using Single Sign On (SSO) option.
* Users may need to follow an account reclaim process if they have used their GBC email to register a Zoom account before.
* Meeting controls may differ depending on whether users access the lecture through a computer or mobile device.
* Support topics for using Zoom with George Brown College are available on this page.
* Contact helpdesk@georgebrown.ca if users encounter issues.
* Phone numbers for support: 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559.
* Users can sign up to receive college news, upcoming events, tours, and application deadlines by visiting the "Sign Up Now" link.
* Additional contact information for George Brown College: ask.george@georgebrown.ca and social media hub.
* Information on the website is subject to change without notice.
* Users are responsible for verifying GBC fee requirements.
